original_text: I will put on him your special clothes. I will tie your belt round him. I will give your authority to him. Then Eliakim will become like a father to the people in Jerusalem and the people in Judah. I will put on him your special clothes. I will tie your belt round him. I will give your authority to him. Then Eliakim will become like a father to the people in Jerusalem and the people in Judah.
korean_text: 네 옷을 그에게 입히며 네 띠를 그에게 띠워 힘 있게 하고 네 정권을 그의 손에 맡기리니 그가 예루살렘 주민과 유다의 집의 아버지가 될 것이며

sentences.original_text: I will put on him your special clothes.
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 그에게 네 특별한 옷을 입히겠다.

sentences.original_text: I will tie your belt round him.
I will give your authority to him.
Then Eliakim will become like a father
